description: To create a RUPAF file, click the menu button and choose "Registration" or "Update Subscription." Then, fill in the name of the user and the serial number. After completing both fields, click "Save File," name the file, and choose the location. After saving the RUPAF file, email the file to Revo Uninstaller and they will send you the "Unlock Key," which you can enter in the registration form to activate the software.
